en.today: Today could mark a pivotal moment in your life's story, beloved ram, as the solar eclipse rises in your sign. Though breakthroughs are likely to emerge, be mindful of how hastily you jump at fresh chances. Eclipses are highly unpredictable, and it'll be important that big decisions are carefully thought out. Jupiter brings a dash of luck your way midafternoon, encouraging you to speak up about your goals and ideas. You'll want to pull back and find the following steps once Mercury retrogrades back into Pisces and cozies up with Neptune, bringing new layers to the imagination.
